mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ao_agent(agent_addr, watchdog_addr, running, version, start_time) VALUES(#{agentAddr}, #{watchdogAddr}, #{running}, #{version}, #{startTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE watchdog_addr=#{watchdogAddr}, running=#{running}, version=#{version}, start_time=#{startTime}
mapper.select: SELECT agent_addr AS agentAddr, watchdog_addr AS watchdogAddr, running, version, start_time AS startTime FROM ao_agent
SELECT json FROM ao_agent_stats WHERE agent_addr=#{agentAddr}
